hero.title: Premium Vietnamese Coffee for Global Markets
hero.subtitle: Connecting coffee roasters and importers worldwide with Vietnam's finest Arabica and Robusta beans

company.name: The Great Beans
company.description: Established in 2018, The Great Beans specializes in producing and exporting premium green coffee beans and roasted Robusta and Arabica coffee from Vietnam's renowned growing regions.
company.mission: To deliver the world's finest Vietnamese coffee while championing sustainability, community upliftment, and environmental stewardship.
company.vision: To be the leading Vietnamese coffee exporter, recognized globally for quality, sustainability, and ethical business practices.

features.title: Excellence in Every Bean
features.description: Discover what makes The Great Beans the preferred choice for coffee roasters and importers worldwide. Our commitment to quality, sustainability, and innovation sets us apart.

premium_quality.title: Premium Quality
premium_quality.description: Hand-selected beans from Vietnam's finest coffee regions, ensuring exceptional flavor profiles and consistent quality in every batch.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Farming
sustainable.description: Environmentally responsible practices that protect biodiversity while supporting local farming communities and preserving natural ecosystems.

award_winning.title: Award Winning
award_winning.description: Internationally recognized for excellence in coffee quality, processing innovation, and sustainable business practices across global markets.

global_sourcing.title: Global Reach
global_sourcing.description: Extensive distribution network spanning 25+ countries, ensuring reliable supply chains and timely delivery to international partners.

ethically_sourced.title: Ethically Sourced
ethically_sourced.description: Direct partnerships with local farmers ensuring fair compensation, community development, and transparent supply chain practices.

fast_delivery.title: Fast Delivery
fast_delivery.description: Efficient logistics and strategic partnerships enable rapid, reliable shipping to global destinations with full traceability.

categories.arabicaDescription: Premium Arabica coffee beans with complex flavors and bright acidity, sourced from high-altitude regions of Vietnam.
categories.robustaDescription: Bold and full-bodied Robusta coffee beans with rich crema, perfect for espresso blends and commercial applications.
categories.specialtyDescription: Exceptional specialty grade coffee beans with unique processing methods and outstanding cupping scores for discerning coffee enthusiasts.
